SEARCH
Package photos.controller

Class OptionsController

java.lang.Object
photos.controller.OptionsController
public class OptionsController extends Object
Controller for the photo options view, or Options.fxml. This controller provides functionality to add/remove captions and tags, view a photo in a fuller, separate display, and copy or transfer/move a photo to another album. Authored by Chloe Wolohan.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the tag type buttons dynamically based on the user's available tag types. Called automatically when the scene is loaded.
